title: Arab man becomes father at 92
text: Arab man becomes father at 92 Web Report /Palestine Filed on February 7, 2017 Share Adam is now a father of eight daughters and five sons. Mahmoud Al-Adam from Palestine has become father again at the age of 92. Adam is now a father of eight daughters and five sons. The baby was delivered by Adam's second wife, Abeer who is 42-year-old. Deaf and mute, she married Adam after his first wife passed away. Man tries to set himself alight at Makkah Grand Mosque "I now have 8 daughters and 5 sons. It was such a surprise to have a baby at this age but this is God's will," Adam was quoted saying by the Al Arabiya. The new born baby has been named Tamara. Abeer is surprised and thrilled to be a mother when she expected least. Share
